title: Agent Manipulation
description: Agent manipulation occurs when attackers influence agent behavior through malicious inputs or environment manipulation. This can lead to unauthorized actions or data exposure.
detection_patterns: Agent receives untrusted input without validation
No input sanitization for agent prompts
Agent state can be manipulated externally
attack_vectors: Prompt injection to manipulate agent behavior

mitigations.description: Validate and sanitize all agent inputs
mitigations.implementation: Implement input validation and sanitization for all agent inputs.

mitigations.description: Protect agent state from unauthorized modification
mitigations.implementation: Implement state validation and integrity checks. Use immutable state where possible.
Implement decision validation and approval workflows for critical actions.

references.title: OWASP Agentic Top 10 - AGENTIC01: Agent Manipulation
